resources.string: Break time has to be less than the total shift time.
Shift begin date must be before shift end date.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history

This window allows you to view, sort, delete and update your shift data. Additionally, you can view your paycheck, and total hours for the displayed shifts. 

Viewing shifts: upon entering this window you will see all of your saved shifts on the table. This is because by default the "All Shifts" option is selected above the table.
Additionally, you can choose to view your shifts according to specific time intervals by selecting the desired filteration option in the dropdown. 

Updating shifts: You can choose to update all information of a desired shift by tapping that shift on the table and selecting the "Update Shift" option. 

Deleting shifts: You can choose to delete a shift by tapping that shift on the table and selecting the "Delete Shift" option.

This windows allows you to view graphed data related to your shifts. In order to view graphs you must: 

1. Choose the type of data you wish to view on the graph. For example: you wish to view a graph for total pay 

 2. Choose the year the graph data is relevant for. For example: 2016

3. Choose The month the graph data is relevant for. You can decide to view the graph data for all months of the year. Or you can decide to view the graph data for a particular month only.

4. Once you have chosen the type of data you would like to see, simply press the "Generate Graph" button to view the graph.

Note: if the graph displays "no chart data available" after pressing the "Generate Graph" button, then there is no graph data to display for the particular choices specified in steps 1-3.
